placeShips

public java.util.List<Ship> placeShips(java.util.List<Ship> shipList)
This method is called at the beginning of the game to determine where the player wants to place his ships. For each ship set the starting position and the direction in which the ship's length will extend. Make sure ships are not overlapping and are within the defined bounds of the game map.

Parameters:
shipList - A list of ships with all null attributes
Returns:
the shipList with updated values for the starting position and direction the ship is facing

doTurn

public java.util.List<Coordinate> doTurn(java.util.List<Ship> myShips,
                                         java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.List<ActionResult>> actionResults)
This class will be filled in by the player. All logic regarding in game decisions to be made by your bot should be put in here. This class will be called every turn until the end of the game

Parameters:
myShips - List of ships belonging to player
actionResults - the action results
Returns:
a List of coordinates corresponding to where you wish to fire
